upgrade.description: Run 'composer update' to add 'doctrine/dbal' in order to alter the column size and 'php artisan migration' to change the app and workflow descriptions columns

features.description: Requires the slugs for microApp and workflow instances within a group to be unique to prevent collisions

Validate uniqueness in MicroApp editor for Resource, Script, Template and Form names

Validate uniqueness in Workflow editor for Template, Method, Resources and Map names

Validate uniqueness in Api's for Route path/verb combinations and for Resource, Function and File names
Before leaveing the editors for microApps, workflows, or api's you are given a warning if you have unsaved changes
Add PATCH as a verb to microApps in Graphene and to the APIGateway
Increased the description length for microApps and workflows to 1000 characters and added validation to the input forms

old.notes: This release exchanges the master branch for the main branch. All branches are currently merged. All pull requests are merged as well. This is a new baseline and marks a change in the way releases will be managed, with frequency changing to a regular biweekly schedule.

features.description: Enable cache configuration of resouces in workflows

bugs.description: Merged pull request to fix unauthenticated navigation of public pages
Fixes a problem when searching a field in a GrapheneDataGrid whose type has a default template that is not defined explicitly on the field instance.
Allow Api's in the GrapheneApiGateway be configured to have no (0) required parameters and handle that scenario in the gateway itself and the generated documentation as well.
Fix 'user' type field configuration by not parsing the search field unless it is populated - this fixes a current problem introduced in the last release but a better pattern should be defined
